name: Squad Battles: The Proud and the Few.
summary: HPS Simulations and John Tiller are proud to announce the release of Squad Battles: The Proud and the Few. It contains 40 scenarios covering the entire Pacific Theater in World War II involving the US Marine Corps.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
  • 官方网站: http://www.hpssims.com/Pages/Products/SB/ProudFew/ProudFew.html
